projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: Developed a secure password generator with customisable options for uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. Implemented a versatile password generation tool that provides real-time feedback on password strength, promoting user awareness of security best practices. Created a user-friendly password generator that allows for customisable password criteria.

projects.name: MyString - Custom String Class
projects.description: Developed and implemented a custom string class, MyString in C++ with comprehensive functionalities. Functionalities include concatenation, size determination, empty string detection, string appending, and more. Overloaded the insertion operator for streamlined input operations. Applied OOPs principles, ensuring modularity, encapsulation, and reusability of code components.

projects.name: Voix
projects.description: Developed Voix, a voice assistant utilizing speech recognition and APIs for tasks such as send emails, web searches, and computations. Integrated Voix with WolframAlpha and ChatGPT, enhancing its functionality to provide comprehensive results directly within the console interface. Leveraged advanced technologies to create an efficient and user-friendly voice assistant.

experiences.description: Mastered modules including Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, and Apex Testing & Debugging. Developed and deployed applications using Lightning Web Components (LWC) and Salesforce CLI, enhancing process automation and security. Earned Super Badges: Apex Specialist, Process Automation Specialist, and Developer Super Set, demonstrating advanced skills in Salesforce development and automation.

Developed a responsive ChatGPT Client using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Integrated OpenAI API to enable natural language processing capabilities, facilitating seamless communication between users and the AI model. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure efficient implementation.
